description:
Cloud, the Second Prince of the Kingdom of Linhea visits as the envoy for Sue`s marriage proposal. While there, he begs Touya to use his teleportation magic to save his mother who is being held captive by Prime Minister Wardack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futari no Ouji, Soshite Chiisana Kon`yakusha.
Les deux princes et la petite fiancée.
Two Princes and the Small Fiancee
Zwei Prinzen und die kleine Verlobte
二人の王子, そして小さな婚約者.
